languages.text: {n}Кристалл в нагруднике Ирлиэт наливается алым свечением, и каждый вздох эльдарки становится беспокойнее предыдущего.{/n} "Я приняла роль палача, дабы сохранить камень души при себе взамен на чужие страдания. Выжидала, молилась о милости Азуриана... И надеялась лишь сбежать до того, как камень треснет от потока боли и ужаса, обуявшего мою душу. До того, как эксперимент завершится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кристалл в нагруднике Ирлиэт наливается алым свечением, и каждый вздох эльдарки становится беспокойнее предыдущего.{/n} "Я приняла роль палача, дабы сохранить камень души при себе взамен на чужие страдания. Выжидала, молилась о милости Азуриана... И надеялась лишь сбежать до того, как камень треснет от потока боли и ужаса, обуявшего мою душу. До того, как эксперимент завершится".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}The crystal in Yrliet's chestplate lights up with a crimson glow, and each of her breaths becomes more laboured and restless than the last.{/n} "I donned the executioner's mantle — they allowed me to keep my spirit stone in exchange for the suffering of others. I survived, prayed for Asuryan's mercy... and hoped to escape before the stone cracked under the torrent of pain and terror assaulting my soul. Before the experiment was complete."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特胸前的水晶发出了深红色的光芒，她的每次呼吸都变得更加费力，更加焦躁。{/n}“我穿上了刽子手的斗篷——他们允许我保留我的灵魂石，但作为交换，我要将他人的痛苦带给他们。于是我活了下来，祈求阿苏焉的怜悯……我的灵魂不断地被痛苦与恐怖的洪流冲刷。我祈祷我能在灵魂石裂开之前，在他们的实验完成之前逃走。”
languages.original_text: {n}The crystal in Yrliet's chestplate lights up with a crimson glow, and each of her breaths becomes more laboured and restless than the last.{/n} "I donned the executioner's mantle — they allowed me to keep my spirit stone in exchange for the suffering of others. I survived, prayed for Asuryan's mercy... and hoped to escape before the stone cracked under the torrent of pain and terror assaulting my soul. Before the experiment was complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特胸前的水晶发出了深红色的光芒，她的每次呼吸都变得更加费力，更加焦躁。{/n}“我穿上了刽子手的斗篷——他们允许我保留我的灵魂石，但作为交换，我要将他人的痛苦带给他们。于是我活了下来，祈求阿苏焉的怜悯……我的灵魂不断地被痛苦与恐怖的洪流冲刷。我祈祷我能在灵魂石裂开之前，在他们的实验完成之前逃走。”

languages.original_text: {n}The crystal in Yrliet's chestplate lights up with a crimson glow, and each of her breaths becomes more laboured and restless than the last.{/n} "I donned the executioner's mantle — they allowed me to keep my spirit stone in exchange for the suffering of others. I survived, prayed for Asuryan's mercy... and hoped to escape before the stone cracked under the torrent of pain and terror assaulting my soul. Before the experiment was complete."

languages.text: {n}El cristal de la coraza de Yrliet reluce con un brillo carmesí, y cada respiración se vuelve más pesada y trabajosa que la anterior.{/n} «Acepté la carga del verdugo: me permitieron conservar mi joya espiritual a cambio del sufrimiento ajeno. Sobreviví, recé por la piedad de Asuryan... y esperaba escapar antes de que la joya se resquebrajara bajo el torrente de miedo y terror que asaltaba mi alma. Antes de que se completara el experimento».
languages.original_text: {n}The crystal in Yrliet's chestplate lights up with a crimson glow, and each of her breaths becomes more laboured and restless than the last.{/n} "I donned the executioner's mantle — they allowed me to keep my spirit stone in exchange for the suffering of others. I survived, prayed for Asuryan's mercy... and hoped to escape before the stone cracked under the torrent of pain and terror assaulting my soul. Before the experiment was complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cristal de la coraza de Yrliet reluce con un brillo carmesí, y cada respiración se vuelve más pesada y trabajosa que la anterior.{/n} «Acepté la carga del verdugo: me permitieron conservar mi joya espiritual a cambio del sufrimiento ajeno. Sobreviví, recé por la piedad de Asuryan... y esperaba escapar antes de que la joya se resquebrajara bajo el torrente de miedo y terror que asaltaba mi alma. Antes de que se completara el experimento».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの胸当てのクリスタルが深紅の光を放ち、彼女の呼吸のひとつひとつがより苦しげで落ち着きを失っていく。{/n}「私は処刑人のマントを身にまとった…彼らは他者の苦しみと引き換えに、私の魂縛石を保つことを許した。私は生き延び、アシュリアンの慈悲を祈った…そして、私の魂を襲う苦痛と恐怖の激流で石が割れる前に脱出することを願った。実験が完了する前に」
languages.original_text: {n}The crystal in Yrliet's chestplate lights up with a crimson glow, and each of her breaths becomes more laboured and restless than the last.{/n} "I donned the executioner's mantle — they allowed me to keep my spirit stone in exchange for the suffering of others. I survived, prayed for Asuryan's mercy... and hoped to escape before the stone cracked under the torrent of pain and terror assaulting my soul. Before the experiment was complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの胸当てのクリスタルが深紅の光を放ち、彼女の呼吸のひとつひとつがより苦しげで落ち着きを失っていく。{/n}「私は処刑人のマントを身にまとった…彼らは他者の苦しみと引き換えに、私の魂縛石を保つことを許した。私は生き延び、アシュリアンの慈悲を祈った…そして、私の魂を襲う苦痛と恐怖の激流で石が割れる前に脱出することを願った。実験が完了する前に」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Kristall in Yrliets Brustplatte glüht rot. Ihre Atemzüge werden immer angestrengter und rastloser.{/n} "Ich habe den Umhang der Henkerin übergestriffen — sie haben mir im Tausch gegen das Leid anderer gestattet, meinen Seelenstein zu behalten. Ich habe überlebt, habe Asuryan um Gnade angebetet ... und habe gehofft, zu entkommen, ehe der Stein unter der Flut an Schmerz und Furcht zerbricht, die über meine Seele hereinbrach. Ehe das Experiment abgeschlossen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}The crystal in Yrliet's chestplate lights up with a crimson glow, and each of her breaths becomes more laboured and restless than the last.{/n} "I donned the executioner's mantle — they allowed me to keep my spirit stone in exchange for the suffering of others. I survived, prayed for Asuryan's mercy... and hoped to escape before the stone cracked under the torrent of pain and terror assaulting my soul. Before the experiment was complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kristall in Yrliets Brustplatte glüht rot. Ihre Atemzüge werden immer angestrengter und rastloser.{/n} "Ich habe den Umhang der Henkerin übergestriffen — sie haben mir im Tausch gegen das Leid anderer gestattet, meinen Seelenstein zu behalten. Ich habe überlebt, habe Asuryan um Gnade angebetet ... und habe gehofft, zu entkommen, ehe der Stein unter der Flut an Schmerz und Furcht zerbricht, die über meine Seele hereinbrach. Ehe das Experiment abgeschlossen ist."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le cristal sur le plastron d'Yrliet s'illumine d'une lueur écarlate et sa respiration se fait de plus en plus laborieuse.{/n} « Ils m'ont permis de garder ma pierre-esprit en échange de la souffrance des autres, alors j'ai accepté de jouer les bourreaux. J'ai survécu, j'ai prié Asuryan pour qu'il m'accorde sa merci... et j'ai espéré m'échapper avant que ma pierre ne cède sous le torrent de douleur et de terreur qui assaillait mon âme. Avant que l'expérience ne prenne fin. »
languages.original_text: {n}The crystal in Yrliet's chestplate lights up with a crimson glow, and each of her breaths becomes more laboured and restless than the last.{/n} "I donned the executioner's mantle — they allowed me to keep my spirit stone in exchange for the suffering of others. I survived, prayed for Asuryan's mercy... and hoped to escape before the stone cracked under the torrent of pain and terror assaulting my soul. Before the experiment was complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cristal sur le plastron d'Yrliet s'illumine d'une lueur écarlate et sa respiration se fait de plus en plus laborieuse.{/n} « Ils m'ont permis de garder ma pierre-esprit en échange de la souffrance des autres, alors j'ai accepté de jouer les bourreaux. J'ai survécu, j'ai prié Asuryan pour qu'il m'accorde sa merci... et j'ai espéré m'échapper avant que ma pierre ne cède sous le torrent de douleur et de terreur qui assaillait mon âme. Avant que l'expérience ne prenne fin. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in göğüs zırhındaki kristal, kızıl bir parıltı saçıyor. Aldığı her nefes, bir öncekinden daha zahmetli ve huzursuzlaşıyor.{/n} "İnfazcı rolünü üstlendim. Diğerlerinin acı çekmesi pahasına ruh taşımı korumama izin verdiler. Hayatta kaldım, Asuryan'ın merhameti için dua ettim ve... Ruhuma hücuma geçen tüm o acı ve dehşet sağanağı altında ruh taşım çatlamadan, deney tamamlanmadan evvel kaçabilmeyi umdum."
languages.original_text: {n}The crystal in Yrliet's chestplate lights up with a crimson glow, and each of her breaths becomes more laboured and restless than the last.{/n} "I donned the executioner's mantle — they allowed me to keep my spirit stone in exchange for the suffering of others. I survived, prayed for Asuryan's mercy... and hoped to escape before the stone cracked under the torrent of pain and terror assaulting my soul. Before the experiment was complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in göğüs zırhındaki kristal, kızıl bir parıltı saçıyor. Aldığı her nefes, bir öncekinden daha zahmetli ve huzursuz bir his uyandırıyor.{/n} "İnfazcı rolünü üstlendim. Diğerlerinin acı çekmesi pahasına ruh taşımı korumama izin verdiler. Hayatta kaldım, Asuryan'ın merhameti için dua ettim ve... Ruhuma hücuma geçen tüm o acı ve dehşet sağanağı altında ruh taşım çatlamadan, deney tamamlanmadan evvel kaçabilmeyi umdum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
